author: Ann Brashares
quote: Parents were the only ones obligated to love you; from the rest of the world you had to earn it.

author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
quote: Always kiss your children goodnight, even if they’re already asleep.

author: Narendra Modi
quote: I come from a poor family, I have seen poverty. The poor need respect, and it begins with cleanliness.

author: Burmese Proverb
quote: In time of test, family is best.

author: David Ogden Stiers
quote: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.

author: Unknown
quote: True happiness can be found in the love of family, neighbours, and truly accepting God.

author: Chris Noth
quote: Everyone feels like family and I am back in the city that I love.

author: Unknown
quote: A family is just a small world that has been created with love.

author: Richard Bach
quote: Rarely do members of the same family grow up under the same roof.

author: Brigitte Nielsen
quote: All I know is it destroyed my family, it destroyed my marriage to Sylvester and I will never get over it.

author: Unknown
quote: Children are a blessing from the start and it is hard not to love them with all our hearts.

author: Princess Diana
quote: Family is the most important thing in the world

author: Sergio Garcia
quote: I am what I am. I love golf, I love my life, I love my family and friends.

author: Bernard Shaw
quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.

author: Anthony Liccione
quote: Everyone needs a house to live in, but a supportive family is what builds a home.

author: Jessica Lange
quote: For me, nothing has ever taken precedence over being a mother and having a family and a home.

author: Jon Corzine
quote: No family gets rich from earning the minimum wage. In fact, the current minimum wage does not even lift a family out of poverty.

author: Unknown
quote: Your kids won’t care about how much money you had. They will care that you were there to make happy memories with them.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: Spend time with those you love. One of these days you will say either “I wish I had” or “I’m glad I did”.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: Actors are one family over the entire world.

author: Angela Schwindt
quote: While we try to teach our children all about life, our children teach us what life is all about.

author: Celine Dion
quote: My kids give me the balance to live right

author: Alexa Vega
quote: I consider my mom and all my sisters my friends

author: M. Russell Ballard
quote: What matters most is what lasts longest, and our families are for eternity.

author: Unknown
quote: A child can outgrow your lap, but they will never outgrow your heart.

author: Willie Stargell
quote: There's nothing I value more than the closeness of friends and family, a smile as I pass someone on the street.

author: Mitch Albom
quote: Sticking with your family is what makes it a family.

author: Burmese Proverb
quote: In time of test, family is best.

author: Meek Mill
quote: I know all I really wanna do is get money and take care of my family.

author: Wendy Wunder
quote: The magic thing about home is that it feels good to leave, and it feels even better to come back.

author: Marlon Wayans
quote: I think family is key, and if you have love for family, then you have love for others, and you have unity as a people.

author: Princess Diana
quote: Family is the most important thing in the world.

author: Lee Lacocca
quote: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family.

author: Unknown
quote: Hug family members long and forgive them quickly.

author: Unknown
quote: I smile because you’re my sister I laugh because you can’t do anything about it.

author: Rodrigo Santoro
quote: The distance, being far away from your home, from your family, that's not easy. There are times when you say, 'Wow, what a fight, what a battle.'

author: Harry Styles
quote: I can see how you could get dragged into the bad stuff, but I've got good friends around me, good family. I think I've got my head screwed on.

author: Kristen Bell
quote: I have the best roommates in the world! It creates a fun sense of family... and that's really important to me. Things can get so lonely without it.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: After a good dinner one can forgive anybody, even one’s own relations.

author: Unknown
quote: Family rules: always say ‘I love you’ and remember that you are loved.

author: O A Battista
quote: Before most people start boasting about their family tree, they usually do a good pruning job.

author: Unknown
quote: Our family is like a tree. The branches might grow and go off into different directions, but we all have the same roots.

author: Unknown
quote: God couldn’t be everywhere, so he made grandparents.

author: Unknown
quote: We aren’t “step”, we aren’t “half”, we’re just family.

author: Will Durant
quote: The family is the nucleus of civilization

author: Anwar Hadid
quote: I think our family motto is to always work hard, be humble, kind, and thoughtful about others around us.

author: Unknown
quote: A family’s love is worth more than all of the money in the world.

author: Edie Falco
quote: Coming home to my family afterward makes the work richer, easier and more fun.

author: Unknown
quote: Love your parents. We can be so busy growing up that we can easily forget that they are growing old.

author: Chris Kyle
quote: I really don’t care what people think of me. I’ve got my family. I’ve got my friends.

author: Bobby Darin
quote: My family comes first. Maybe that’s what makes me different from other guys.

author: Unknown
quote: Cousins are our childhood playmates who grow up to be our friends forever.

author: Unknown
quote: Not all family is related by blood, but they are family all the same.

author: Unknown
quote: Even when you argue with your family, the love is always there.

author: Vartan Gregorian
quote: Dignity is not negotiable. Dignity is the honor of the family

author: Unknown
quote: Time passes and pulls us apart, but we will always be cousins at heart.

author: Unknown
quote: Our families are the links to our past and the bridges to our future.

author: Unknown
quote: A brother is a friend that has been given to you by nature.

author: Romeo Miller
quote: Family always gonna be there. The material things, they come and go.

author: Robert Buckley
quote: Next to hurting my family, cheating on me is the worst thing someone could do.

author: Reba McEntire
quote: I don't think quantity time is as special as quality time with your family.

author: Marie Curie
quote: I have frequently been questioned, especially by women, of how I could reconcile family life with a scientific career. Well, it has not been easy.

author: Javier Hernandez
quote: We are a big family; we are all very close, and we always want to talk about what is going on with each other.

author: Grace Kelly
quote: Women’s natural role is to be a pillar of the family

author: Anna Chlumsky
quote: My family and school life are important to me.

author: Unknown
quote: Once in awhile, right in the middle of an ordinary life, love gives us a fairy tale.

author: Unknown
quote: As people who have grown together with us, cousins hold a special place in our hearts.

author: Buddy Hackett
quote: As a child my family's menu consisted of two choices: take it or leave it.

author: Debi Mazar
quote: The kitchen is the heart of every home, for the most part. It evokes memories of your family history.

author: Unknown
quote: When one member in a family is happy, the rest of the family rejoices as well.

author: Unknown
quote: The family is one of nature’s masterpieces.

author: Unknown
quote: Grandchildren make the world a little softer, kinder, and warmer.

author: Peace Pilgrim
quote: No one can find inner peace except by working, not in a self- centered way, but for the whole human family.

author: Unknown
quote: A baby can make love stronger and the future worth living for.

author: Bobby Darin
quote: My family comes first. Maybe that’s what makes me different from other guys

author: Jenna Morasca
quote: My advice: Take a second out of the day today and be thankful for your family.

author: Buddha
quote: A family is a place where minds come in contact with one another.

author: Unknown
quote: Family stands for Father And Mother, I Love You!

author: Marsha Norman
quote: Family is just accident… they don’t mean to get on your nerves. They don’t even mean to be your family, they just are.

author: Jean Reno
quote: I'm a minimalist. I don't really need much to enjoy a good holiday - just my family and the bare essentials.

author: John C. Maxwell
quote: Family and friendships are two of the greatest facilitators of happiness.

author: Len Goodman
quote: Life is precious and relationships are precious. I’m a great believer in family.

author: Darren Aronofsky
quote: I grew up in a family with two very strong women, my mother and my older sister, and they were big influences on my life.

author: Unknown
quote: A daughter is a love that will last you a lifetime.

author: Paul Lynde
quote: I sang in the choir for years, even though my family belonged to another church.

author: Unknown
quote: Family is a gift that lasts forever.

author: Jeremy Sisto
quote: You can't have a happy family if you don't have a happy marriage.

author: Frank Knox
quote: God did not intend the human family to be wafted to heaven on flowery beds of ease

author: Walt Whitman
quote: I have learned that to be with those I like is enough

author: Richard Bach
quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.

author: John Oates
quote: I have a great family, I live an amazing life.

author: Regina Brett
quote: Your children get only one childhood. Make it memorable.

author: Toni Collette
quote: I love holidays. It's such a wonderful time for the whole family to be together and not have to worry about schedules and that kind of thing.

author: Unknown
quote: There are times when you will find that your family is the best gift that you could ever have in this life.

author: Laurence J Peter
quote: Heredity is what sets the parents of a teenager wondering about each other.

author: Unknown
quote: First we had each other, then we had you. Now, we have everything.

author: Unknown
quote: Not matter where you go and what you accomplish in life, never forget that family that you came from.

author: Unknown
quote: Treat your parents with loving care. You will only know their value when you see their empty chair.

author: Russell M. Nelson
quote: The Sabbath provides a wonderful opportunity to strengthen family ties.

author: Unknown
quote: Family: an anchor during rough waters.

author: Cote de Pablo
quote: My priority is to hang out with the ones I love, my family, my loved ones.

author: Unknown
quote: Our family is a circle of strength of love with every birth and every union the circle grows.

author: Michael J. Fox
quote: Family is not an important thing. It’s everything.

author: George Santayana
quote: The family is one of nature’s masterpieces

author: Monica Bellucci
quote: I’m a lucky person because I’ve been loved a lot. I have a great family.

author: J.S. Bryan
quote: Many men can make a fortune but very few can build a family.

author: Walt Disney
quote: A man should never neglect his family for business.

author: Jonathan Safran Foer
quote: One day you will do things for me that you hate. That is what it means to be family.

author: Faith Hill
quote: The foundation of family, that’s where it all begins for me

author: Unknown
quote: Cousins are connected heart to heart. Distance and time can’t tear them apart.

author: Leo Tolstoy
quote: All happy families resemble one another, each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.

author: Lemony Snicket
quote: Love can change a person the way a parent can change a baby awkwardly, and often with a great deal of mess.

author: Deb Caletti
quote: That’s what people do who love you. They put their arms around you and love you when you’re not so lovable.

author: Gertrude Stein
quote: It is extraordinary that when you are acquainted with a whole family you can forget about them

author: Chris Brown
quote: Since I'm always working, my best holiday memories are definitely when I can just go home and spend time with my family.

author: Unknown
quote: The best gift that my parents gave me was my brother.

author: Willie Stargell
quote: There’s nothing I value more than the closeness of friends and family, a smile as I pass someone on the street

author: Bindi Irwin
quote: Family doesn't necessarily mean that you have to have a mother, a father, a little brother, and an older sister.

author: Tyson Fury
quote: I pray for forgiveness. For help and guidance. To be a better person. For the health of my family. For the world to be a better place.

author: Mike Honda
quote: Equal pay isn't just a women's issue; when women get equal pay, their family incomes rise and the whole family benefits.

author: Charlie Sheen
quote: Dad kept us out of school, but school comes and goes. Family is forever

author: Peter Morgan
quote: No family is complete without an embarrassing uncle.

author: Lisa Weedn
quote: Being a family means you are a part of something very wonderful. It means you will love and be loved for the rest of your life.

author: Eric Hoffer
quote: Children are the keys of paradise.

author: Elizabeth Edwards
quote: It takes a lot of work to put together a marriage, to put together a family and a home

author: Anthony Brandt
quote: Other things may change us, but we start and end with the famil.

author: Ann Brashares
quote: Parents were the only ones obligated to love you; from the rest of the world you had to earn it.

author: Matthew Quick
quote: You need to make time for your family no matter what happens in your life

author: George Eliot
quote: Little children are still the symbol of the eternal marriage between love and duty

author: Jerry Della Femina
quote: Whether you're a mafia guy or in advertising, you always end up going back to your family.

author: Anthony Liccione
quote: Everyone needs a house to live in, but a supportive family is what builds a home.

author: Unknown
quote: To understand your parents’ love, you must raise children yourself.

author: Tyson Fury
quote: I am fighting royalty. I have gypsy kings on both sides of the family.

author: Unknown
quote: Mothers nourish, so their young can flourish.

author: Kate Moss
quote: I love the Royal Family. The Queen, she's fabulous.

author: Thich Nhat Hanh
quote: If we are peaceful, if we are happy, we can smile, and everyone in our family, our entire society, will benefit from our peace.

author: Emma Roberts
quote: I'm surrounded by great friends and family. I don't know what I would do without them.

author: Abraham Lincoln
quote: All that I am or ever hope to be, I owe to my angel Mother.

author: Unknown
quote: You call it chaos. We call it family.

author: Jon Krakauer
quote: Happiness is only real when shared

author: Ogden Stiers
quote: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.

author: Unknown
quote: Most families are like fudge in that they are mostly sweet with a few nuts.

author: Margaret Laurence
quote: In some families, ‘please’ is described as the magic word. In our house, however, it was ‘sorry’.

author: Unknown
quote: A mother can take the place of all others, but no one else can take her place.

author: George Moore
quote: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs, and returns home to find it.

author: Bob Ehrlich
quote: Some of the most important conversations I’ve ever had occurred at my family’s dinner table

author: Walt Disney
quote: A man should never neglect his family for business

author: Unknown
quote: Being a Mother means that your heart is no longer yours; it wanders wherever your children go.

author: Unknown
quote: The love in our family is a love that flows strong and deep, leaving us with wonderful memories to cherish and keep.

author: Sonny Perdue
quote: Since I was a boy - born into a farming family in Bonaire, GA - I've had agriculture running through my veins.

author: Jet Li
quote: I believe the world is one big family, and we need to help each other.

author: Unknown
quote: Our family is a circle of strength and love.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: I sustain myself with the love of family.

author: Unknown
quote: A house is built by hands, but a home is built by heart.

author: Spanish Proverb
quote: An ounce of blood is worth more than a pound of friendship.

author: Guy Lafleur
quote: When trouble comes, it’s your family that supports you.

author: Unknown
quote: While family life can be full of ups and downs, it can be hard to imagine anything that is more nourishing for the soul.

author: Unknown
quote: The greatest thing in family life is to take a hint when a hint is intended and not to take a hint when a hint is not intended.

author: Unknown
quote: Your family will be there for you through all of the ups and downs.

author: Genevieve
quote: I'm not sure I'm a good cook. But I like cooking, and it's a real family thing - an expression of love being together.

author: Unknown
quote: Family. Where life begins and love never ends.

author: Cindy Morgan
quote: I love spending time with my friends and family. The simplest things in life give me the most pleasure: cooking a good meal, enjoying my friends.

author: Olivier Martinez
quote: It’s nice to have some distance with your family. As long as you’re closer to them by love.

author: Li Na
quote: I would prefer to have no money but to have a nice family and good friends around.

author: Unknown
quote: Nothing in the world can match the love of a grandchild.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: I sustain myself with the love of family.

author: Ugo Betti
quote: I think the family is the place where the most ridiculous and least respectable things in the world go on.

author: Jamie Lee Curtis
quote: I’ve always put my family first and that’s just the way it is

author: John Waters
quote: I've always been close to my family. I've got a lot of nieces and nephews, but I'm a good uncle.

author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
quote: The family is the test of freedom; because the family is the only thing that the free man makes for himself and by himself

author: J.S. Bryan
quote: Many men can make a fortune but very few can build a family.

author: Coy Bowles
quote: God Bless my mother and father for all the hard work they've done for our family.

author: Unknown
quote: A garden of love flowers and grows within a grandmother’s heart.

author: Unknown
quote: Family is like music, some high notes, some low notes, but always a beautiful song.

author: Jeremy Sisto
quote: You can’t have a happy family if you don’t have a happy marriage.

author: Unknown
quote: Families are like fudge, mostly sweet with a few nuts.

author: Unknown
quote: When you are in a family, your happiness is everyone’s happiness as well.

author: Unknown
quote: There is no buddy out there like a brother.

author: Pope John Paul II
quote: As the family goes, so goes the nation and so goes the whole world in which we live.

author: Lauren Alaina
quote: Before I go to bed, I thank God for blessing me with all the things he blessed me with, and for my family to be safe.

author: Unknown
quote: A daughter can easily brighten your day and warm your heart.

author: Julian Baggini
quote: Any celebration meal to which guests are invited, be they family or friends, should be an occasion for generous hospitality.

author: Patrick Warburton
quote: I have a family to support. And I’m not always going to be doing exactly what I want to do.

author: Manute Bol
quote: I love my family

author: Bo Bennett
quote: Spend some time this weekend on home improvement; improve your attitude toward your family.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: The love of the family, the love of one person can heal. It heals the scars left by a larger society. A massive, powerful society.

author: Labrinth
quote: Everyone in my family has been in music - my cousins, my grandmother, my grandfather - so it's quite a big family tree.

author: Melissa Etheridge
quote: I'm very fortunate that I have a wonderful family around me and loved ones.

author: Anthony Brandt
quote: Other things may change us, but we start and end with the family.

author: Unknown
quote: When you are feeling sad and forlorn, your family will guide you through any storm.

author: Travis Barker
quote: I wanted to say thanks... and share my gratitude for everything I've been blessed with. Family, friends, and continued support from everyone.

author: Unknown
quote: As parents, we hope that our children won’t want to stop being our best friends when they become older.

author: Harry Styles
quote: I’ve got a really good family; I’ve got great friends around me.

author: Unknown
quote: A family is where life begins and love never ends.

author: Adrian Grenier
quote: What is important is family, friends, giving back to your community and finding meaning in life.

author: Unknown
quote: Nobody is a better role model or a bad example than an older brother or sister.

author: Melanie Shankle
quote: Sometimes the best families are the ones God builds using unexpected pieces of our hearts.

author: Unknown
quote: There is no better friend than a sister.

author: Unknown
quote: Your family will be there for you when you succeed, but they will also be there for you when you stumble.

author: Unknown
quote: I realised when you look at your mother, you are looking at the purest love you will ever know.

author: Unknown
quote: Your aunt is the only one who can hug like your mother, keep your secrets like a sister, and give love like a friend.

author: Marian Wright Edelman
quote: Family and moral values are so central to everything that I am.

author: Justin Bieber
quote: I want to be a young dad. By 25 or 26 I want to see myself, like, married or start looking for a family.

author: Bob Ehrlich
quote: Some of the most important conversations I've ever had occurred at my family's dinner table.

author: Unknown
quote: An ounce of blood is worth more than a pound of friendship.

author: Alex Haley
quote: In every conceivable manner, the family is link to our past, bridge to our future.

author: Richard Bach
quote: Rarely do members of the same family grow up under the same roof

author: Unknown
quote: We may not have it all together but together we have it all.

author: Christopher Love
quote: Pray in your family daily, that yours may be in the number of the families who call upon God.

author: President Harold B. Lee
quote: The most important work you will ever do will be within the walls of your own home.

author: David Ogden Stiers
quote: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.

author: Napoléon Bonaparte
quote: Show me a family of readers, and I will show you the people who move the world.

author: Mark Wahlberg
quote: For me, family always comes first; I would do anything to protect them.

author: Foxy Brown
quote: I'm cut from a different cloth. I would never moon someone. I was raised in a good family.

author: George Burns
quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.

author: Mark V. Olsen
quote: At the end of the day, a loving family should find everything forgivable.

author: Janine di Giovanni
quote: Sibling rivalry was, and still is to this day, rampant in my family. We were all competing for my parents' divided attention.

author: Richard M. Daley
quote: I’ve given it my all. I’ve done my best. Now, I’m ready with my family to begin the next phase of our lives

author: Unknown
quote: It is not flesh and blood but heart which makes us father and sons.

author: Unknown
quote: Family. A little bit of crazy, a little bit of loud & a whole lot of love.

author: Ezra Taft Benson
quote: Do not leave yourself or your family unprotected against financial storms... Build up savings.

author: Unknown
quote: If you have a family that loves you, a few good friends, food on your table and a roof over your head. You are richer than you think.

author: Al Roker
quote: I love cooking for myself and cooking for my family

author: George Moore
quote: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs, and returns home to find it.

author: Julie Plec
quote: You can love and hate your family with equal measure, but the power of the bond you have to have with them, you can't really ever walk away.

author: Unknown
quote: We don’t need to have a long journey just to find love because in our home we have love and that’s the family.

author: Unknown
quote: The greatest legacy that you can give to your children is a wealth of happy memories.

author: Kim Kardashian
quote: I always put clothes and family photos under the mattress, in case the house burns down.

author: Billy Joel
quote: Like family, we are tied to each other. This is what all good musicians understand.

author: Sandra Bullock
quote: You don’t have to give birth to someone to have a family

author: Heidi Klum
quote: I grew up in a big family with a lot of kids around, and I definitely want to have children as well

author: Desmond Tutu
quote: You don’t choose your family. They are God’s gift to you, as you are to them.

author: Unknown
quote: A truly rich man is one whose children run into his arms when his hands are empty.

author: Unknown
quote: A family’s love lasts forever.

author: Amos Oz
quote: I find the family the most mysterious and fascinating institution in the world.

author: J. Edgar Hoover
quote: No amount of law enforcement can solve a problem that goes back to the family.

author: Joyce Meyer
quote: I believe that the greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you.

author: Robin Hobb
quote: Home is people. Not a place. If you go back there after the people are gone, then all you can see is what is not there anymore.

author: Leo Tolstoy
quote: All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.

author: Princess Diana
quote: What must it be like for a little boy to read that daddy never loved mummy

author: Unknown
quote: Govern a family as you would cook a small fish, very gently.

author: Unknown
quote: Families are like fudge; most are sweet but you will also find a few nuts in there.

author: Maureen O’Hara
quote: I was born into the most remarkable and eccentric family I could possibly have hoped for

author: Unknown
quote: The members of a family can end up having to make plenty of sacrifices but they will never have to sacrifice their unending love for one another.

author: Unknown
quote: A grandchild can have a way of filling up a space in your heart that you never knew was empty.

author: Unknown
quote: No matter how much you argue, your mother will always be there for you.

author: Unknown
quote: Fewer things can bring people joy than the unconditional love of their family.

author: Patrick Schwarzenegger
quote: I’m very fortunate to have been raised in my family. I learned early about the importance of giving back.

author: Coy Bowles
quote: I love coming back home and seeing old friends and family. I would say it keeps me grounded.

author: Barbara Bush
quote: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.

author: Barbara Bush
quote: Cherish your human connections, your relationships with friends and family.

author: Charles Kuralt
quote: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege

author: Unknown
quote: Being a brother can be better than being a superhero.

author: Henry Ward Beecher
quote: The most important thing a father can do for his children is to love their mother.

author: Suze Orman
quote: Estate planning is an important and everlasting gift you can give your family. And setting up a smooth inheritance isn't as hard as you might think.

author: Unknown
quote: Family… Like branches on a tree our lives may grow in different directions but our roots will stay as one!!

author: Jet Li
quote: I believe the world is one big family, and we need to help each other

author: Buddha
quote: A family is a place where minds come in contact with one another.

author: John Lasseter
quote: Sunday, for me, is all about being home with the family with no plans.

author: Unknown
quote: In the end all you’ll ever have in life is your family, so keep them close, while you still have them around.

author: Unknown
quote: Even when you find it hard to believe, your family will never stop loving you.

author: George Carlin
quote: The other night I ate at a real nice family restaurant. Every table had an argument going.

author: Regina King
quote: I stay in tune with my family and God.

author: Ring Lardner
quote: The family you come from isn’t as important as the family you’re going to have.

author: Michael J. Fox
quote: Family is not an important thing, it’s everything.

author: Unknown
quote: Daughters are like flowers, they fill the world with so much beauty.

author: Charles Eastman
quote: Friendship is held to be the severest test of character. It is easy, we think, to be loyal to a family and clan, whose blood is in your own veins.

author: Serena Williams
quote: Tennis just a game, family is forever

author: Cary Grant
quote: Insanity runs in my family. It practically gallops

author: Elizabeth Edwards
quote: It takes a lot of work to put together a marriage, to put together a family and a home.

author: Unknown
quote: Our family is a circle of strength of love with every birth and every union the circle grows.

author: Unknown
quote: The love of your family is the greatest thing that you will ever have.

author: Siri Hustvedt
quote: My greatest pleasure is spending time with my family: my husband and daughter, but also my mother, my three sisters, and their families.

author: Ivanka Trump
quote: Divorce is never a nice thing, but it's very easy to take family for granted, and when there's a divorce, you don't take things for granted so much.

author: Amos Oz
quote: I find the family the most mysterious and fascinating institution in the world.

author: Oliver Hudson
quote: Blood relatives often have nothing to do with family, and similarly, family is about who you choose to make your life with.

author: Angela Schwindt
quote: While we try to teach our children all about life, our children teach us what life is all about.

author: Li Na
quote: I would prefer to have no money but to have a nice family and good friends around.

author: Unknown
quote: What I love most about my home is who I share it with.

author: Clayton M. Christensen
quote: The single most important factor in our long-term happiness is the relationships we have with our family and close friends.

author: Ralph Fiennes
quote: One of the things that binds us as a family is a shared sense of humor

author: Ogden Nash
quote: A family is a unit composed not only of children but of men, women, an occasional animal, and the common cold.

author: Unknown
quote: Family, a link to the past and a bridge to our future.

author: Douglas Adams
quote: Humans are not proud of their ancestors, and rarely invite them round to dinner.

author: Unknown
quote: I never knew how much love my heart could hold until someone called me mommy.

author: Eric Hoffer
quote: Children are the keys of paradise.

author: Unknown
quote: Love your family. Spend time, be kind & serve one another. Make no room for regrets. Tomorrow is not promised & today is short.

author: Unknown
quote: There is no better place than in a family’s loving embrace.

author: Zac Posen
quote: Food is everything. Food, friends, family: Those are the most important things in life.

author: Unknown
quote: Family is the only thing that you can be certain of in life.

author: Bjork
quote: I always wanted to be a farmer. There is a tradition of that in my family.

author: Princess Diana
quote: Family is the most important thing in the world.

author: Don Marquis
quote: I would rather start a family than finish one.

author: John Wooden
quote: The most important thing in the world is family and love.

author: Unknown
quote: Family is the best thing you could ever wish for. They are there for you during the ups and downs, and love you no matter what.

author: Mark Goddard
quote: Life is about family and technology.

author: Ralph Fiennes
quote: One of the things that binds us as a family is a shared sense of humor.

author: Penelope Cruz
quote: I don’t know if I believe in marriage. I believe in family, love and children

author: Reba McEntire
quote: I don’t think quantity time is as special as quality time with your family.

author: Ryan Zinke
quote: I believe in the value of life. I believe we must prepare our children for tomorrow with the family values of my grandparents.

author: Martin Short
quote: I pretend I'm one of the royal family when I'm in a hotel and that the hotel belongs to me - it is a palace.

author: Akshay Kumar
quote: Work is work, but family is for life. That’s what really matters to me.

author: Unknown
quote: Our path may change as life goes along, but the bond between us remains ever strong. I miss you SISTER.

author: Erma Bombeck
quote: I come from a family where gravy is considered a beverage.

author: Edward Furlong
quote: I don’t think anyone has a normal family

author: Unknown
quote: Family is the compass that guides us.

author: Leo Tolstoy
quote: All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.

author: Unknown
quote: You spend years wishing your parents would get off your back, only to realize they’re the only ones who ever really had your back.

author: Unknown
quote: He who can be a good son can be a good father.

author: Barbara Bush
quote: Cherish your human connections, your relationships with friends and family

author: Marjorie Pay Hinckley
quote: Home is where you are loved the most and act the worst.

author: Alex Haley
quote: In every conceivable manner, the family is link to our past, bridge to our future.

author: John Cheever
quote: When I remember my family, I always remember their backs. They were always indignantly leaving places

author: Kenny Wormald
quote: I have a really good family. I’m lucky to have people who support me and love me in my life.

author: Unknown
quote: A family should love you for who you are.

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance

author: Anthony Anderson
quote: I realised my family was funny, because nobody ever wanted to leave our house

author: William Butler Yeats
quote: No man has ever lived that had enough of children’s gratitude or woman’s love.

author: George Burns
quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.

author: Unknown
quote: A family always sticks together no matter what.

author: DJ Khaled
quote: What's so beautiful about Miami is that we support each other. We're just one big family, not just the entertainers, just everyone in general.

author: Anita Baker
quote: You leave home to seek your fortune and, when you get it, you go home and share it with your family

author: Penelope Lombard
quote: My family is really boring. They have a coffee table book called ‘Pictures We Took Just to Use Up the Rest of the Film.’

author: Tupac Shakur
quote: With all my fans I got a family again.

author: Unknown
quote: Your child is always your child, regardless of age. You feel their feelings, share in their joys and hurt in their sorrows.

author: Unknown
quote: Having a place to go is home. Having someone to love is a family. Having both is a blessing.

author: Unknown
quote: An aunt is like a mom, only cooler.

author: Susannah York
quote: Seeing the family is a very important part of my weekend.

author: Michael Weatherly
quote: We are very excited about welcoming a new member of the family, a daughter!

author: Ellen G. White
quote: Christ tears away the wall of partition, the self-love, the dividing prejudice of nationality, and teaches a love for all the human family.

author: Bill Cosby
quote: Human beings are the only creatures on earth that allow their children to come back home.

author: Beau Bridges
quote: And when I've been away from my family and friends, I have felt good hearing some of those old songs.

author: Mother Teresa
quote: If you want to change the world, go home and love your family.

author: Austin O'Brien
quote: I do get to have my normal childhood. I just love to get together with my friends and family and have a good time.

author: Pope John XXIII
quote: The family is the first essential cell of human society.

author: Unknown
quote: Grandchildren complete life’s circle of love.

author: Chanakya
quote: As a single withered tree, if set aflame, causes a whole forest to burn, so does a rascal son destroy a whole family.

author: Bertrand Russell
quote: The place of the father in the modern suburban family is a very small one, particularly if he plays golf.

author: Andre Maurois
quote: Without a family, man, alone in the world, trembles with the cold.

author: Unknown
quote: If you don’t believe in ghosts, you’ve never been to a family reunion.

author: Desmond Tutu
quote: The God who existed before any religion counts on you to make the oneness of the human family known and celebrated.

author: Mike Birbiglia
quote: I love pizza. I want to marry it, but it would just be to eat her family at the wedding.

author: Elizabeth II
quote: Like all the best families, we have our share of eccentricities, of impetuous and wayward youngsters and of family disagreements.

author: Unknown
quote: The time that you get to spend with your family is worth every single second.

author: David McCallum
quote: If I had no family, my wife and I would lead a much more romantic and nomadic existence

author: Unknown
quote: A family is one of nature’s greatest masterpieces.

author: Brad Henry
quote: Families are the compass that guide us. They are the inspiration to reach great heights, and our comfort when we occasionally falter.

author: Clayton M. Christensen
quote: The single most important factor in our long-term happiness is the relationships we have with our family and close friends.

author: Martin O'Malley
quote: The death penalty is ineffective as a deterrent, and the appeals process is expensive and cruel to the surviving family members.

author: Grace Kelly
quote: Women’s natural role is to be a pillar of the family.

author: Unknown
quote: Big sisters are angels sent by God to guide us through the thick and thin.

author: Romeo Miller
quote: Family always gonna be there. The material things, they come and go.

author: Unknown
quote: Great sisters get promoted and become aunts.

author: Unknown
quote: A family does not need to be perfect, they just need to be united together.

author: Unknown
quote: When you help out your family, you do not expect anything out of it. You just do it because they are family.

author: Unknown
quote: Never sacrifice your family, your heart, or your dignity.

author: Unknown
quote: Families and the love that keeps them strong must be cultivated like a garden, with time, effort, and patience.

author: Barbara Bush
quote: You know sit with your arm around a little kid and read. It not only teaches them to read but it keeps the family strong.

author: Lil’ Kim
quote: I love spending time with my dog, my niece and my family. I’m very family-oriented.

author: Unknown
quote: The loving family is God’s masterpiece.

author: John Oates
quote: I have a great family, I live an amazing life

author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan
quote: My family is my strength and my weakness

author: Unknown
quote: Every family has a different story to tell.

author: Iyanla Vanzant
quote: Family is supposed to be our safe haven. Very often, it’s the place where we find the deepest heartache.

author: Unknown
quote: Friends are the family we choose.

author: Unknown
quote: Let your kids get dirty and roll in the mud. Allow them to be a little messy. They are only young once.

author: David DeNotaris
quote: My family provided me with the proper information and inspiration for me to overcome the challenge of blindness.

author: Divyanka Tripathi
quote: Happiness is being content with what you have, living in freedom and liberty, having a good family life and good friends.

author: Unknown
quote: Being sister and brother means that you are there for each other.

author: Brad Henry
quote: Families are the compass that guide us. They are the inspiration to reach great heights, and our comfort when we occasionally falter.

author: Candace Cameron Bure
quote: The memories we make with our family is everything.

author: Unknown
quote: Any man can be a father but it takes someone special to be a dad.

author: Barbara Bush
quote: Cherish your human connections, your relationships with friends and family.

author: Unknown
quote: Family loves you no matter what.

author: Haywood Nelson
quote: My family was my guide to my reality.

author: Deepika Padukone
quote: I have a lot of friends, but my biggest fear is loneliness. I miss my family in Mumbai, and my biggest nightmare every day is to go back home alone.

author: Kofi Annan
quote: Knowledge is power. Information is liberating. Education is the premise of progress, in every society, in every family.

author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan
quote: My family is my strength and my weakness.

author: George Santayana
quote: The family is one of nature’s masterpieces.

author: Mario Puzo
quote: The strength of a family, like the strength of an army, lies in its loyalty to each other.

author: Unknown
quote: People are pretty forgiving when it comes to other people’s families. The only family that ever horrifies you is your own.

author: Lil' Kim
quote: I am blessed to have so many great things in my life - family, friends and God. All will be in my thoughts daily.

author: Unknown
quote: Mothers and daughters are closest when daughters become mothers.

author: B. B. King
quote: Growing up, I was taught that a man has to defend his family. When the wolf is trying to get in, you gotta stand in the doorway.

author: Leo Tolstoy
quote: Happy families are all alike; every unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.

author: George Eliot
quote: What greater thing is there for human souls than to feel that they are joined for life, to be with each other in silent unspeakable memories.

author: Eva Burrows
quote: Family love is messy, clinging and of an annoying and repetitive pattern, like bad wallpaper.

author: Bo Bennett
quote: Spend some time this weekend on home improvement; improve your attitude toward your family.

author: Mary Decker
quote: I can’t complain about my life. I have a really nice life. I have a great family and I live in a gorgeous part of the country.

author: Unknown
quote: Depending on your luck, your sibling can be your best friend or your worst enemy.

author: Unknown
quote: Bringing up a family should be an adventure.

author: George Augustus Moore
quote: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs and returns home to find it.

author: Unknown
quote: There is no such thing as a perfect parent. Just be a real one.

author: Unknown
quote: To have the love of a family is the greatest blessing in life.

author: Gail Lumet Buckley
quote: Family faces are magic mirrors looking at people who belong to us, we see the past, present, and future.

author: Desmond Tutu
quote: You don’t choose your family. They are God’s gift to you, as you are to them.

author: Unknown
quote: A grandchild’s laughter is the best medicine.

author: Unknown
quote: The family that you come from is not as important as the family that you are going to have.

author: Michael J. Fox
quote: Family is not an important thing. It’s everything

author: Ron Howard
quote: I'm lucky in a lot of ways. And in my family life, my home life, is where I count myself the luckiest.

author: Jim Butcher
quote: When everything goes to hell, the people who stand by you without flinching, they are your family.

author: Unknown
quote: A son is a love that lasts a lifetime.

author: John Bowring
quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.

author: Marjorie Pay Hinckley
quote: Home is where you are loved the most and act the worst.

author: Elliott Erwitt
quote: I enjoy nothing more than spending time with my loved ones, young and old, and at least once a year we get together for a formal family photograph.

author: Regina King
quote: I stay in tune with my family and God

author: Unknown
quote: Without a family, man, alone in the world, trembles with the cold, Andre Maurois

author: Unknown
quote: Families are like branches on a tree. We grow in different directions yet our roots remain as one.

author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel
quote: A family can develop only with a loving woman as its centre

author: Philip Green
quote: It’s all about quality of life and finding a happy balance between work and friends and family.

author: Unknown
quote: Blood makes you related, loyalty makes you family.

author: Fabrice Muamba
quote: Family and God, that is what’s important. Money, cars, those are things that come and go.

author: Lee Iacocca
quote: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family.

author: Unknown
quote: You don’t have to like your family, but you do have to love them.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I looked up my family tree and found out I was the sap.

author: Harry S. Truman
quote: I have found the best way to give advice to your children is to find out what they want and then advise them to do it.

author: John Lasseter
quote: Sunday, for me, is all about being home with the family with no plans.

author: John Ruskin
quote: Give a little love to a child, and you get a great deal back

author: Penny Marshall
quote: I have a good support system of friends and family.

author: Thomas E. Perez
quote: Of all the tough decisions in life, choosing between the job you need and the family you love should not be one of them.

author: Sandra Bullock
quote: I have friends and family that are filled with massive amounts of integrity. And it shouldn’t be an oddity.

author: Unknown
quote: Family love is something sweet that cannot be beat.

author: Peter Buffett
quote: It didn’t matter how big our house was; it mattered that there was love in it.

author: Unknown
quote: Our siblings are our best friends and our partners in crime.

author: Unknown
quote: Family, today’s little moments become tomorrow’s precious memories.

author: Elizabeth Fishel
quote: Both within the family and without, our sisters hold up our mirrors: our images of who we are and of who we can dare to be

author: Unknown
quote: A dad is a child’s first hero.

author: Ring Lardner
quote: The family you come from isn’t as important as the family you’re going to have

author: Rachel Brosnahan
quote: I think home has become my friends and family, wherever they are.

author: David Ogden Stiers
quote: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten

author: Kevin Alejandro
quote: I absolutely love spending time with my family.

author: Unknown
quote: Brothers and sisters are as close as hands and feet.

author: Unknown
quote: A family bond is unlike any other relationship out there.

author: Jonathan Davis
quote: When you live on the road, going home is a place to escape and just be with your family to unwind.

author: Evan Esar
quote: Family: A social unit where the father is concerned with parking space, the children with outer space, and the mother with closet space.

author: Margaret Mead
quote: Sister is probably the most competitive relationship within the family, but once the sisters are grown, it becomes the strongest relationship.

author: Patrick Warburton
quote: I have a family to support. And I’m not always going to be doing exactly what I want to do

author: Lee Iacocca
quote: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family.

author: Jennifer Ellison
quote: Going home and spending time with your family and your real friends keeps you grounded.

author: Unknown
quote: A family should always be loving and giving without expecting anything in return.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I looked up my family tree and found three dogs using it.

author: Unknown
quote: A mother’s treasure is her daughter.

author: Henry Ian Cusick
quote: Hawaii is a beautiful place to bring up a family.

author: Dodie Smith
quote: The family, that dear octopus from whose tentacles we never quite escape, nor, in our inmost hearts, ever quite wish to.

author: Unknown
quote: A man may love his wife his most, but he loves his mother the longest.

author: John C. Maxwell
quote: Family and friendships are two of the greatest facilitators of happiness.

author: Unknown
quote: Other things may change, but we start and end with family.

author: Michael Angarano
quote: I kind of love coming home and being with family and feeling comfortable and knowing where I come from; I kind of like it.

author: Unknown
quote: No matter how busy you can get, it is always nice to make some time for your family.

author: Lilly Singh
quote: You need a really solid foundation of friends and family to keep you where you need to be.

author: Unknown
quote: I may not be able to give my kids everything they want but I give them what they need. Love, time, and attention. You can’t buy those things.

author: Harry S. Truman
quote: I have found the best way to give advice to your children is to find out what they want and then advise them to do it.

author: Michelle Stewart
quote: Never be afraid to ask for help, especially when you have good friends or family who are likely more than willing to help out.

author: Clayton Christensen
quote: The single most important factor in our long-term happiness is the relationships we have with our family and close friends.

author: Unkown
quote: Being a family means you are a part of something very wonderful. It means you will love and be loved for the rest of your life.

author: Mario Batali
quote: The kitchen really is the castle itself. This is where we spend our happiest moments and where we find the joy of being a family.

author: Jessica Lange
quote: For me, nothing has ever taken precedence over being a mother and having a family and a home

author: Unknown
quote: No family is perfect…

author: Kelsey Chow
quote: I'm very lucky to have a strong support system with my friends and my family. They have kept me grounded.

author: Unknown
quote: Other things might change us, but no matter what, we begin and end as a family.

author: Luke Bryan
quote: Every day I wake up and I lay in bed counting my blessings and saying my prayers for how fortunate I am to have great fans and health and family.

author: Anne Wojcicki
quote: My perfect weekend is going for a walk with my family in the park. I don't think there's anything better.

author: Mel Gibson
quote: A woman should be home with the children, building that home and making sure there’s a secure family atmosphere

author: Walt Disney
quote: We believed in our idea - a family park where parents and children could have fun- together.

author: Robert Frost
quote: Home is the place where, when you have to go there, they have to take you in.

author: Unknown
quote: My children are the source of my strength, frustration, happiness, insanity, sanity, irritability. They are the definition of unconditional love.

author: Francis Bacon
quote: Important families are like potatoes. The best parts are underground.

author: Dodie Smith
quote: The family, that dear octopus from whose tentacles we never quite escape, nor, in our inmost hearts, ever quite wish to.

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven

author: Mitch Albom
quote: Strangers are just family you have yet to come to know.

author: Unknown
quote: A family is not just who you share blood with. Family is about who you love and who loves you back.

author: Jet Li
quote: My wife is the boss at home, and my daughters are the bosses. I am just the worker. We are a very warm family and very happy.

author: Unknown
quote: A mothers love will never end. It is there from beginning to end.

author: Unknown
quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.

author: Monica Bellucci
quote: I'm a lucky person because I've been loved a lot. I have a great family.

author: Jean Reno
quote: I’m a minimalist. I don’t really need much to enjoy a good holiday, just my family and the bare essentials.

author: Unknown
quote: The love of a grandparent will never grow old.

author: Unknown
quote: The most beautiful thing in this world is to see your parents smiling and knowing that you are the reason behind that smile.

author: Andre Maurois
quote: Without a family, man, alone in the world, trembles with the cold.

author: Unknown
quote: Being a parent means loving your children more than you will ever love yourself.

author: Mitch Albom
quote: Sticking with your family is what makes it a family.

author: Unknown
quote: Love is the cement that keeps the foundation of a family strong. The family members are all bricks that rely on the love to keep them all together.

author: Unknown
quote: A son is a son till he takes a wife, a daughter is a daughter all of her life.

author: Unknown
quote: A daughter is one of the most beautiful gifts that this world can give.

author: Charles R. Swindoll
quote: A family is a place where principles are hammered and honed on the anvil of everyday living

author: Elizabeth Gilbert
quote: We must take care of our families wherever we find them.

author: Unknown
quote: The family that prays together stays together.

author: Unknown
quote: When you teach your son, you teach your son’s son.

author: Viola Davis
quote: I definitely have a happy marriage and family life.

author: Unknown
quote: A grandparent will never run out of hugs and kisses.

author: Unknown
quote: A daughter is a gift of love.

author: Patricia Velasquez
quote: Thank God I had all these family values or who knows where I’d be now.

author: Unknown
quote: One of the best things that a father can do for his children is to love their mother.

author: Chris Brown
quote: Since I’m always working, my best holiday memories are definitely when I can just go home and spend time with my family.

author: Unknown
quote: Family is forever.

author: Rod Stewart
quote: You go through life wondering what is it all about but at the end of the day it's all about family.

author: Sam Levenson
quote: Siblings: Children of the same parents, each of whom is perfectly normal until they get together.

author: Daniel Patrick Moynihan
quote: The richest inheritance any child can have is a stable, loving, disciplined family life.

author: Ansel Elgort
quote: I had a birthday party with my family and friends at a house, and Chipotle catered. It was beautiful.

author: T.I.
quote: At the end of the day, I got to live my life for my family, for my children, and I’m going to do what’s best for them.

author: Erma Bombeck
quote: I come from a family where gravy is considered a beverage.

author: Robert Buckley
quote: Next to hurting my family, cheating on me is the worst thing someone could do.

author: Sharon Stone
quote: I'm enjoying my years, I'm enjoying my life, I'm enjoying my family. I'm just happy - a happy person.

author: Unknown
quote: When a family is together, they have everything.

author: Lewis Black
quote: Everybody’s family has different values.

author: Unknown
quote: When you fall, your family will be there to pick you up.

author: Unknown
quote: The greatest gift you can give our children is showing how much you believe in them and their potential.

author: Cote de Pablo
quote: My priority is to hang out with the ones I love - my family, my loved ones.

author: Victoria Smurfit
quote: If you’re Irish, it doesn’t matter where you go, you’ll find family.

author: Michael Enzi
quote: If we abandon marriage, we abandon the family

author: Jim Butcher
quote: When everything goes to hell, the people who stand by you without flinching, they are your family.

author: Deb Caletti
quote: That’s what people do who love you. They put their arms around you and love you when you’re not so loveable.

author: Unknown
quote: Family is a true gift that no amount of money can buy.

author: Walt Whitman
quote: I have learned that to be with those I like is enough.

author: Barbara Bush
quote: Family and friends and faith are the most important things in your life and you should be building friendships.

author: Unknown
quote: A house is made of walls and beams… A home is made of love and dreams.

author: Hollis Stacy
quote: Coming from a big family, I learned a lot. Things don't have to be perfect. You can do okay with 'almost.'

author: Lee Iacocca
quote: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family

author: Kim Yuna
quote: What I miss the most is chatting with my friends and family and having a good laugh over a simple meal.

author: Unknown
quote: A family can be one’s anchor during the roughest storm.

author: Tom DeLay
quote: A woman can take care of the family. It takes a man to provide structure, to provide stability

author: Terri Clark
quote: When someone has cancer, the whole family and everyone who loves them does, too.

author: Haywood Nelson
quote: My family was my guide to my reality

author: George Santayana
quote: The family is one of nature's masterpieces.

author: Unknown
quote: The love of a family is life’s greatest blessings.

author: Catherine Bach
quote: A perfect dinner for me is being with people I really want to be with. It starts and stops with my company and my family.

author: Unknown
quote: You are family and I will love you until the end of time.

author: Geena Davis
quote: I was really lucky that I had an aunt who was very inspiring to me. She was different than anybody in my family on either side.

author: Mother Theresa
quote: What can you do to promote world peace? Go home and love your family.

author: Suzanne Vega
quote: You have to defend your honor. And your family.

author: Unknown
quote: I think togetherness is a very important ingredient to family life, Barbara Bush

author: Emma Roberts
quote: I’m surrounded by great friends and family. I don’t know what I would do without them.

author: Stieg Larsson
quote: Then I discovered that being related is no guarantee of love!

author: Jonathan Safran Foer
quote: One day you will do things for me that you hate. That is what it means to be family.

author: Unknown
quote: Always love your mother because there will never be another.

author: Unknown
quote: True happiness can be found in the love of one’s family.

author: Unknown
quote: When you look at your life, you will find that your greatest source of happiness is your family.

author: Mahesh Babu
quote: In modern life, we tend to forget family values because of the hectic schedule.

author: Unknown
quote: Family where life begins & love never ends.

author: Imelda Marcos
quote: Life is not a matter of place, things or comfort; rather, it concerns the basic human rights of family, country, justice and human dignity.

author: Unknown
quote: Being a family means you are a part of something very wonderful. It means you will love and be loved for the rest of your life. No matter what.

author: Steve Chen
quote: Almost every time we get together with family or friends, the conversation ends up being about food.

author: Julia Barr
quote: We love to be with our family and friends and I can tell you that lots of eating will be involved

author: Michael Imperioli
quote: My family is my life, and everything else comes second as far as what’s important to me.

author: Ezra Miller
quote: Family is this very deep, complex thing that for most people becomes everything. It informs your entire life.

author: Serena Williams
quote: Tennis just a game, family is forever.

author: Unknown
quote: So much of what is best in us is bound up in our love of family.

author: Erma Bombeck
quote: Family life got better and we got our car back, as soon as we put ‘I love Mom’ on the license plate.

author: Charles Kuralt
quote: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege.

author: Matt Lauer
quote: Outside of my family and my work, I have two passions, both instilled in me by my father: golf and fishing.

author: Benjamin Todd Jealous
quote: Let us nurture the practice of family values, by embracing policies that value families.

author: Unknown
quote: Being part of a family means being part of something wonderful. You will love and be loved for the rest of your life no matter what happens.

author: Unknown
quote: Our greatest treasures are our happy family memories. They are an heirloom that is passed down from one generation to the next.

author: Unknown
quote: When I think of any of my successes, I am thankful to God from whom all blessings flow, and to my family and friends who enrich my life.

author: Unknown
quote: Family is the most important thing in the world.

author: Lindsay Fox
quote: If you believe you can make a difference, then you will make a difference. Believe in yourself, your family and your community and you will win.

author: Jean Dujardin
quote: I like simple things. I like being in my family in the South and playing petanque.

author: Unknown
quote: In times when you are feeling lost and adrift, never forget that your family is a gift.

author: Mitt Romney
quote: America cannot continue to lead the family of nations around the world if we suffer the collapse of the family here at home

author: Unknown
quote: Always treasure your family, you never know how much time you have left with them.

author: Lidia Bastianich
quote: Holidays - any holiday - are such a great opportunity to focus on bringing the family together.

author: Unknown
quote: In stressful times of grief and sorrow, your family will help you look forward to tomorrow.

author: Bernard Shaw
quote: Perhaps the greatest social service that can be rendered by anybody to this country and to mankind is to bring up a family.

author: Alyssa Milano
quote: If you come from a solid family structure, it doesn’t matter what you go through in your life. You’re going to be okay.

author: Jada Pinkett Smith
quote: It’s very important to prioritize. I know, for me, my family comes first. That makes every decision very easy.

author: Barbara Bush
quote: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there

author: Unknown
quote: The best thing about having a sister is having a best friend.

author: Unknown
quote: A sibling is not only your first best friend, they will also be your friend for life.

author: Dave Grohl
quote: When Nirvana became popular, you could very easily slip and get lost during that storm. I fortunately had really heavy anchors - old friends, family.

author: Richard Bach
quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other’s life.

author: Unknown
quote: One of the most important relationships that we can have in this world is our relationship with our mother

author: Unknown
quote: Love your mother, the most beautiful person on this earth. Our best critic, yet our strongest supporter.

author: Unknown
quote: Your child will only hold your hand for a little while, but they will hold your heart for a lifetime.

author: Alex Haley
quote: When you start about family, about lineage and ancestry, you are talking about every person on earth.

author: Alex Haley
quote: In every conceivable manner, the family is link to our past, bridge to our future

author: Unknown
quote: Being a sister can be better than being a princess.

author: Robin S. Sharma
quote: Whether you lead a nation, an enterprise, a community, or a family, we are all in the communication business.

author: Joseph Brodsky
quote: Cherish your human connections: your relationships with friends and family.

author: Charles Kuralt
quote: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege.

author: Lil’ Kim
quote: I am blessed to have so many great things in my life, family, friends and God. All will be in my thoughts daily.

author: Lil' Kim
quote: I love spending time with my dog, my niece and my family. I'm very family-oriented.

author: Guy Lafleur
quote: When trouble comes, it’s your family that supports you

author: Brad Pitt
quote: A family is a risky venture, because the greater the love, the greater the loss… That’s the trade-off. But I’ll take it all.

author: Christopher Love
quote: Pray in your family daily, that yours may be in the number of the families who call upon God.

author: Thomas Fuller
quote: He that has no fools, knaves nor beggars in his family was begot by a flash of lightning.

author: Khalil Gibran
quote: You are the bows from which your children as living arrows are sent forth.

author: L. Tom Perry
quote: The family is the center of life and it is the key to eternal happiness.

author: Unknown
quote: A mother’s hug lasts long after she lets go.

author: Mary Karr
quote: A dysfunctional family is any family with more than one person in it.

author: Jerry Seinfeld
quote: There is no such thing as fun for the whole family

author: Unknown
quote: Your family members are also your best friends and they will love you to the very end.

author: Unknown
quote: Sometimes being a brother is better than being a superhero.

author: Ajith Kumar
quote: No matter how big you are, when you go back home, your family treats you like a normal person.

author: Barbara Bush
quote: I think togetherness is a very important ingredient to family life.

author: Olivia Holt
quote: I am thankful for all the blessings and talents I have been given, but most of all I am thankful for my loving and supportive family.

author: Kevin Alejandro
quote: I absolutely love spending time with my family.

author: Robin Hobb
quote: Home is people. Not a place.

author: Unknown
quote: Family is a haven in a world full of chaos.

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.

author: Christopher Paolini
quote: Those whom we most love are often the most alien to us.

author: Zell Miller
quote: My family is more important than my party.

author: Kris Kristofferson
quote: Being in love with a lot of people is incompatible with a stable family life.

author: R. Madhavan
quote: I always believe that the elders in my family are the reason for my success.

author: Jane Howard
quote: Call it a clan, call it a network, call it a tribe, call it a family. Whatever you call it, whoever you are, you need one.

author: Jim Butcher
quote: There’s nothing that makes you more insane than family. Or more happy. Or more exasperated. Or more secure.

author: Unknown
quote: The love of family is more important than wealth and privilege.

author: Pope John XXIII
quote: The family is the first essential cell of human society

author: Unknown
quote: The love of a family is life’s greatest blessings.

author: Ryan Eggold
quote: I love all my fam. I have quite possibly the best dad, mom, and sister in the world.

author: Morgan Wootten
quote: To be successful in coaching you have to treat your team like a family. The leader needs backing from everyone.

author: Unknown
quote: It’s not how big the house is, it’s how happy the home is.

author: Unknown
quote: Never take your family for granted. They will always go to the moon and back for you.

author: Unknown
quote: If you have a family that loves you, then you are richer than you think.

author: Unknown
quote: Sacrifice, selflessness, tears, joy, and happiness are things that all families go through.

author: Unknown
quote: There is no way to be a perfect parent, but there are a million ways to be a good one.

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance.

author: Maggie Gallagher
quote: Mothers are the people who love us for no good reason. And those of us who are mothers know it’s the most exquisite love of all.

author: David Beckham
quote: I’m a strong person, I’m a strong family man, I’m a strong husband and a strong father.

author: Unknown
quote: Sometimes as parents we fall short of our expectations and even the expectations of our kids. It is okay to make mistakes. Nobody is perfect.

author: Unknown
quote: The love that is in our family is strong and deep like an old tree.

author: Khaled Hosseini
quote: I'm a pretty uncomplicated person. I live a very simple life with my family and I enjoy very ordinary things.

author: Desmond Tutu
quote: God's dream is that you and I and all of us will realize that we are family, that we are made for togetherness, for goodness, and for compassion.

author: Marcus Samuelsson
quote: Weekends are sacred for me. They're the perfect time to relax and spend time with family and friends.

author: Unknown
quote: In time of test, family is best.

author: Chris O’Donnell
quote: I look to my family for my support. I’m fortunate to have a big family.

author: Unknown
quote: Having somewhere to go is home. Having someone to love is family. Having both is a blessing.

author: Chiranjeevi
quote: I always believe holidays strengthen the family bond, away from our daily hectic schedules.

author: Unknown
quote: Grandparents are the footsteps for the future generations.

author: Unknown
quote: Family does not have to always be blood. Family consists of the people who are there for you when you need them the most.

author: Evan Esar
quote: Family: A social unit where the father is concerned with parking space, the children with outer space, and the mother with closet space.

author: Unknown
quote: Your children are the most precious gift, prime example of perfection, and clearly an accurate definition of pure; unconditional love.
